channel.title: bash on An old coder
channel.description: Recent content in bash on An old coder

item.title: Shell Scripting
item.description: So I didn’t wait to get other work done and went ahead and built the shell script to automate converting all of my csv files. I did a few stackoverflow searches to find some information about getting filenames into a shell script and then iterating over them. I also had to look up how to determine the filename without the extension as I had to create a new .json filename for the output file.
